CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'GREAT'), "I'm GREAT", IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Baseball'), 'Badges for Baseball', IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Special Initiative'), 'Special Initiative', IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Healthy Lifestyles'), 'Healthy Lifestyles', IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'TRAIL'), 'TRAIL', IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'OVC'), 'OVC', IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'SOI'), 'SOI', '')))))))
CustomField.label: Grant Type
